thread.section_title: MOO.COM Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MOO.COM | www.moo.com | 6 of 147
thread.title: Tim Paul

author: Tim Paul
title: Tim Paul
text: My business cards were not cheap as far as cards go, but were the tiniest expense when it comes to creating a brilliant impression with my client. I watch as the received the card, how positively they react when the first feel the quality and thickness of the stock board. I love the facial expressions when they discover the raised print, and the bright colours. Most importantly though, they pay attention to the key message and the call to action - an invitation to learn more about my business. Exactly what was designed!
